sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="x_snc_disa_store_user_defined_services"> <x_snc_disa_store_user_defined_services action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <available>true</available> <number>USEDEFSER0001001</number> <service_code>TRANS001</service_code> <service_description>Network Transport Services will be provided via tunneling over:  Common Mission Networkl Transport (CMNT),  Secret Internet Protocol Router (SIPRNet) Commercial ISP (internet Service Provider)  Transport using these services is provided to the customer edge. The customer is responsible for providing the equipemnt necessary to tunnel securely across either a single nework or a combination of the aforementioned networks.</service_description> <service_name>Transport Options</service_name> <sys_class_name>x_snc_disa_store_user_defined_services</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>jnyika</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-03-14 22:15:53</sys_created_on> <sys_id>572d635613f89300f60ebccf3244b0c8</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>jnyika</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-03-14 22:16:00</sys_updated_on> <unit_cost>22000</unit_cost> </x_snc_disa_store_user_defined_services> </record_update>
